meanings.sent1: The pseudo diamond turned out to be a fake.
meanings.sent2: She wore a pseudo smile to hide her true feelings.
meanings.sent3: The pseudo magician's tricks were easily exposed.
meanings.sent4: His pseudo kindness was just a facade.
meanings.sent5: The pseudo gold glittered but was worthless.

meanings.definition: Pretending to be something it is not.
meanings.sent1: The pseudo hero saved the day in the movie.
meanings.sent2: She put on a pseudo accent to impress her friends.
meanings.sent3: The pseudo princess danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: His pseudo confidence was shattered by reality.
meanings.sent5: The pseudo expert was quickly exposed as a fraud.

meanings.definition: Having a deceptive resemblance to something.
meanings.sent1: The pseudo designer bag looked just like the real one.
meanings.sent2: The painting had a pseudo depth that fooled many.
meanings.sent3: The pseudo celebrity was actually a lookalike.
meanings.sent4: His pseudo humility masked his true arrogance.
meanings.sent5: The pseudo flower smelled sweet but was artificial.
